text:
The Pongal sales at Co-optex showrooms in Vellore will come to a close on January 31.

Officials said the 30 per cent discount on all products of Co-optex, and 40 per cent discount on selected silk items will be in the offing for the two days.

According to a press release, Vellore circle of Co-optex registered sales to the tune of Rs. 30.46 crore during 2014-2015.

A target of Rs. 36.50 crore was fixed for 2015-2016, of which Rs. 24.08 crore worth sales has been achieved so far.

In addition, Co-optex has already introduced online shopping through its website – www.cooptex.com and gift voucher scheme in the denominations of Rs. 500, Rs. 1,000 and Rs. 2,000 to attract customers, the release said. — Staff Reporter
title: Co-optex Pongal sales to end in 2 days
